comments: Do the work and you\'ll be alright.

Overall good teacher. Hands off but not completely disconnected. The only minor annoyance was multiple promises to grade homework early but she never delivered on it. It was a waste of having to buy the SNHU "textbook bundle" for this class though. My computer lab book is still in the plastic. (Not the professors fault, but SNHU I think.)

I agree with the student below me. She wasn\'t a bad teacher and the class was pretty easy. She does take a while to grade things, but it wasn\'t that big of a deal. She always answered my questions promptly and was helpful. All you have to do is participate in the discussions and do your work, and you\'ll get an A.
She\'s not that bad of a teacher. I went in knowing quite a bit so this class was a breeze for me. Shrug, I don\'t understand how people can not know some of that stuff.

A very nice teacher, though not extremely active in the discussion boards. I didn\'t learn too much that was new, but I had a lot of computer experience prior to this course. She\'s very flexible and easy to talk to about things. She doesn\'t keep up with/update grades too regularly though.
Was very slow to update grades, not very helpful.
